QuestData.Title: Signal the Attack
QuestData.Description: Now that you've lured Skullcrusher the Mountain away from the Twilight Gate, it's time to signal your forces at Crushblow to attack!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Attack Signal from atop one of the towers at the Twilight Gate.
QuestData.RewardText: The horns have been sounded. Crushblow should launch their attack at any moment.$B$BNow there's only one thing left to take care of.
